admin1.description:
State or Province ISO3166-2 Code

In the US see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2:US
admin1.title: admin1

admin2.description:
County or second level subdivision

In the US use FIPS code: https://www.nrcs.usda.gov/wps/portal/nrcs/detail/national/home/?cid=nrcs143_013697
admin2.title: admin2

ClearingAndRenewalEvent.description: Clearing and renewal event for orchards / vinyards.

date.description:
The date the crop event happened (formatted as ISO8061 date: YYYY-MM-DD and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).

Dates for liming and burning can be approximate or the first day of the crop year.
date.title: date

externalId.description:
External crop event identifier.

Used to correlate data back to the originating system and to synchronize repeated imports.
externalId.title: externalId

id.description:
Nori's internal crop event identifier.

Used to synchronize repeated imports.
id.title: id

percentRenewed.description: Percentage or orchard or vinyard that was cleared and renewed.
percentRenewed.title: percentRenewed

source.description:
Source of the event

Optional field to indicate what system this data point originated from.
source.title: source

ClearingAndRenewalEvent.title: ClearingAndRenewalEvent

name.description: The project's primary contract person.  Provided to the verified.
name.title: name

Crop.description: Crop properties relevant to planted crops.

classification.description:
The crop classification.

You can find a list of acceptable crop classifications per crop `name` [here](https://go.nori.com/inputs).
classification.title: classification

clearingAndRenewalEvents.description: Clearing and renewal events for orchards and vineyards, if applicable.
clearingAndRenewalEvents.title: clearingAndRenewalEvents

externalId.description:
Crop identifier.  Free form external reference

Used to correlate data back to the originating system and to synchronize repeated imports.
externalId.title: externalId

fertilizerEvents.description: A list of fertilizer events, if applicable.
fertilizerEvents.title: fertilizerEvents

grazingEvents.description: A list of grazing events, if applicable
grazingEvents.title: grazingEvents

harvestEvents.description:
A list of harvest events, if applicable.

Straw / Stover harvest exception: If the hay or stover was removed
separately after grain / fruit / tuber harvest, do NOT add this as
a second harvest. Instead, enter the percent of the remaining residue
that was removed on the grain harvest, regardless of removal date.
harvestEvents.title: harvestEvents

id.description:
Nori's internal crop identifier.

Used to synchronize repeated imports
id.title: id

irrigationEvents.description: A list of irrigation events, if applicable.
irrigationEvents.title: irrigationEvents

limingEvents.description: A list of liming events, if applicable. During quantification, liming events are aggregated into a single event.
limingEvents.title: limingEvents

name.description: The name/alias that the crop is known by. This property is used in the to-be-deprecated supplier intake sheet.
name.title: name

organicMatterEvents.description: A list of organic matter and manure application events, if applicable.
organicMatterEvents.title: organicMatterEvents

plantingEvents.description:
The planting event(s) if there were any for the current crop year otherwise empty array or omit property.

This will contain a single event for annuals and none for perennials outside of the planting year.
plantingEvents.title: plantingEvents

soilOrCropDisturbanceEvents.description:
A list of soil or crop disturbance events events, if applicable (such as tillage or termination events).

All crops will need to define a soil or crop disturbance event <= the associated `PlantingEvent`.
soilOrCropDisturbanceEvents.title: soilOrCropDisturbanceEvents

type.description:
Crop type name from Nori's known crop names.

You can find a list of accepted crops [here](https://go.nori.com/inputs).
type.errorMessage: must specify one of the allowed crop types=
type.title: type

Crop.title: Crop

CropEvent.description: A crop event that happened on a particular date.

date.description:
The date the crop event happened (formatted as ISO8061 date: YYYY-MM-DD and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).

Dates for liming and burning can be approximate or the first day of the crop year.
date.title: date

externalId.description:
External crop event identifier.

Used to correlate data back to the originating system and to synchronize repeated imports.
externalId.title: externalId

id.description:
Nori's internal crop event identifier.

Used to synchronize repeated imports.
id.title: id

source.description:
Source of the event

Optional field to indicate what system this data point originated from.
source.title: source

CropEvent.title: CropEvent

CropYear.description: Crop management details grouped by a planting year.

crops.description: A list of crops for a given planting year.
crops.title: crops

dataSourceType.description:
Flag indicating whether data is historical data reported by the grower,
or a projection of future data.
dataSourceType.title: dataSourceType

plantingYear.description: The planting year that the herein defined [crops](#crops) property is associated with. Note that a requirement to run quantification is that all crop management practices be mapped to a particular planting year as early as year 2000.
plantingYear.title: plantingYear

CropYear.title: CropYear

date.description:
The date the crop event happened (formatted as ISO8061 date: YYYY-MM-DD and YYYY > 2000 and YYYY < 2100).

Dates for liming and burning can be approximate or the first day of the crop year.
date.title: date

externalId.description:
External crop event identifier.

Used to correlate data back to the originating system and to synchronize repeated imports.
externalId.title: externalId

id.description:
Nori's internal crop event identifier.

Used to synchronize repeated imports.
id.title: id

lbsOfNPerAcre.description: Amount of nitrogen applied in lbs/ac.
lbsOfNPerAcre.title: lbsOfNPerAcre

name.description: The name/alias that the fertilizer is known by. This property is used in the to-be-deprecated supplier intake sheet.
name.title: name

source.description:
Source of the event

Optional field to indicate what system this data point originated from.
source.title: source

type.description:
The fertilizer classification type.

Note that the fertilizer type does not currently impact quantification as it only impacts n2o emissions.
As such, we default the type to "mixed blends" when this property is excluded/nulled.
type.title: type

Field.description: A field defining annual crop management practices. Fields are defined by geographic boundaries that contain crop management practices that are identical across the whole of that boundary.

assignmentOfAuthority.description:
assignmentOfAuthority - Is there an assignment of authority in place?
i.e. Is the field leased land?
assignmentOfAuthority.title: assignmentOfAuthority

cropYears.description: A list of crop management details grouped by the crop planting year.
cropYears.title: cropYears

earliestEvidenceYear.description:
Earliest evidence is the first year a field has any digital or hard copy records of its practices
(instead of an external data set to infer practices) and is used to calculate the number of eligible years to issue NRTs.
earliestEvidenceYear.title: earliestEvidenceYear

externalId.description:
Field identifier from external system.

Used to correlate data back to the originating system and to synchronize repeated imports.
This field must be unique within a project.
externalId.title: externalId

anyOf.description: operator (lessee as shown on lease if land is leased)

geojson.description:
The geographic boundaries (defined as GeoJSON) associated with crop management practices.

For additional guidance and limitation of boundary files, [refer to the FAQ here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1vnJKwFzU6drCjTD-eVXUK_59togcmROliyOU1y8Ne1U/edit?ts=5ed8f2d1#heading=h.fbiiknhrzhg8)
geojson.title: geojson

historicLandManagement.description: Details surrounding how the field was managed before year 2000.
historicLandManagement.title: historicLandManagement

id.description:
Nori's internal field identifier.

Used to synchronize repeated imports.
id.title: id

anyOf.description: landOwners (as shown on deed, MUST LIST ALL OWNERS)

legalAcres.description: legalAcres Number of acres in this parcel per your insurance policy if known.
legalAcres.title: legalAcres

anyOf.description: mailingAddress Mailing Address (where your property tax notice for lands in question is mailed to)

physicalEvidenceDoesNotCorroborateSwitch.description: Used to indicate that the available physical evidence does not corroborate the provided switch year.
physicalEvidenceDoesNotCorroborateSwitch.title: physicalEvidenceDoesNotCorroborateSwitchYear

practiceChangesAdopted.title: practiceChangesAdopted

regenerativeStartYear.description:
The year that you most recently adopted regenerative agricultural practices. aka Switch Year

For more information on how to select a start year see [here](https://go.nori.com/enrollment-manual).
regenerativeStartYear.title: regenerativeStartYear

Field.title: Field

GeoJSON.Feature<GeoJSON.Geometry,GeoJSON.description:
A feature object which contains a geometry and associated properties.
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-3.2

bbox.description:
Bounding box of the coordinate range of the object's Geometries, Features, or Feature Collections.
The value of the bbox member is an array of length 2*n where n is the number of dimensions
represented in the contained geometries, with all axes of the most southwesterly point
followed by all axes of the more northeasterly point.
The axes order of a bbox follows the axes order of geometries.
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-5
bbox.title: bbox

id.description:
A value that uniquely identifies this feature in a
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-3.2.
id.title: id

type.description: Specifies the type of GeoJSON object.
type.title: type

GeoJSON.Feature<GeoJSON.Geometry,GeoJSON.title: GeoJSON.Feature<GeoJSON.Geometry,GeoJSON.GeoJsonProperties>

represented in the contained geometries, with all axes of the most southwesterly point

items.description:
A Position is an array of coordinates.
https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-3.1.1
Array should contain between two and three elements.
The previous GeoJSON specification allowed more elements (e.g., which could be used to represent M values),
but the current specification only allows X, Y, and (optionally) Z to be defined.

yield.description:
The crop yield.

The current version of quantification does not consider yield when producing estimates. As such, we will default to 0 when left out.

The crop yield units.

The current version of quantification does not consider yield when producing estimates.

HistoricCRPLandManagement.description:
Details surrounding how the field was managed before year 2000

Note that the state the field exists within restricts the allowed values per object property. To find applicable values per location, see [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQQnIlyxCENwJvw5Luyg2Ikbn_X0FvMTNr2J6n5Y2xwcR6oi4OA2jNW-B2DrslTKtrmQxg03byZ_aRV/pubhtml)

crp.description: Whether the field participated in CRP or not.
crp.title: crp

crpType.description: The type of CRP the field participated in. Only applicable if [crp](#crp) is set to true.
crpType.title: crpType

postCRPManagement.description:
How was the field managed after CRP

To find applicable values per field location, see [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQQnIlyxCENwJvw5Luyg2Ikbn_X0FvMTNr2J6n5Y2xwcR6oi4OA2jNW-B2DrslTKtrmQxg03byZ_aRV/pubhtml)
enum: irrigated: annual crops with hay/pasture in rotation
postCRPManagement.title: postCRPManagement

postCRPTillage.description: How was the field managed after tillage
postCRPTillage.title: postCRPTillage

preCRPManagement.description:
How was the field managed before the field entered into CRP

To find applicable values per field location, see [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQQnIlyxCENwJvw5Luyg2Ikbn_X0FvMTNr2J6n5Y2xwcR6oi4OA2jNW-B2DrslTKtrmQxg03byZ_aRV/pubhtml)
enum: irrigated: annual crops with hay/pasture in rotation
preCRPManagement.title: preCRPManagement

preCRPTillage.description: How was the field tilled before the field entered into CRP
preCRPTillage.title: preCRPTillage

preYear1980.description: A description of how the land was managed before 1980.
preYear1980.title: preYear1980

description:
A project encapsulates a set of fields. This is the top-level interface of Nori's Croplands Data Import format.

A project may represent either a complete farming operation for a single operator or a batch
of fields from a data aggregator.

externalId.description:
Project identifier from external system.

Used to correlate data back to the originating system and to synchronize repeated imports.
externalId.title: externalId

anyOf.description: farmAddress Mailing address for the farm in question if the file represents a single operation.

fields.description: An array of fields defining annual crop management practices.
fields.title: fields

id.description:
Nori's internal project identifier.

Used to synchronize repeated imports.
id.title: id

primaryContact.description:
primaryContact Contact info for the operator or data aggregator preparing this file.

This will be the primary point of contract for verifiers.
